name: Aldrin

services.title: Custom Web Development
services.description:
Tailored Design & UI/UX: Create unique, responsive designs that align with your brand and provide a seamless user experience across all devices.

Interactive Features: Develop custom functionality like forms, e-commerce, user accounts, and more using ReactJS and .NET Core.

Performance Optimization: Ensure fast loading speeds and smooth performance through code optimization, image compression, and database management.

Scalability & Security: Build scalable websites that grow with your business and ensure ongoing security updates and feature enhancements.

Ongoing Support: Provide maintenance and troubleshooting to keep your site up-to-date and functioning at its best.

aboutpara:

Beyond tech, Iâ€™m an avid gamer and enjoy hosting my own gaming server for friends. I also love golfing, free diving and scuba diving as ways to relax and explore new activities.

resume.description: Specializing in .NET Core and ReactJS,  with experience managing teams and optimizing backend systems. While I focus on leadership, I stay hands-on with coding, open-source projects, and problem-solving.

experiences.position: Senior Software Engineer - Team Lead at Medimarketing
experiences.bullets: eMIMS Plus: A modern user-friendly website providing comprehensive and up-to-date drug references designed for easy access to essential pharmaceutical information.,eMIMS Elite: An advanced version of eMIMS Plus offering additional premium features such as enhanced search functionality personalized content and advanced data insights tailored for healthcare professionals.,MIMS Online: A legacy system for drug references providing foundational pharmaceutical data but with a more traditional user interface and limited functionality compared to modern solutions.

experiences.position: Software Developer at Resorts World Manila
experiences.bullets: DHC Forms: Health declaration web forms designed for employees and customers ensuring seamless data collection and compliance with health protocols.,Mobile POS: A sales mobile application tailored for merchants and hotels enabling efficient transactions and management on the go with a user-friendly interface.,Hydra: A complex web-based inventory system specifically designed for managing casino items streamlining stock tracking and ensuring accurate inventory management.,Special Events: A desktop application designed to manage promos and events for casinos providing seamless coordination and tracking of casino promotions and activities.

eClaims: A desktop application for tracking claims with PhilHealth providing efficient management and monitoring of healthcare claims.,PayorPortal: A web application designed for the enrollment and maintenance of members enabling streamlined processes for payor services.

education.universityPara: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
